name: Roll Reload - GMTK Game Jam '22
description:
Protect the dice in the name of RNGesus, and stop the forces of the dicevil's evil plot.

Shoot down the enemies, and hit the dice to reload - you'll need to be quick because the number you roll is how much you reload!

Made by one person in a handful of hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022!
